  9: !
 10: !  Include file for Fortran use of the FN object in SLEPc
 11: !
 12: #include "slepc/finclude/slepcfn.h"

 14:       type tFN
 15:         PetscFortranAddr:: v PETSC_FORTRAN_TYPE_INITIALIZE
 16:       end type tFN

 18:       FN, parameter :: SLEPC_NULL_FN = tFN(0)

 20:       PetscEnum FN_COMBINE_ADD
 21:       PetscEnum FN_COMBINE_MULTIPLY
 22:       PetscEnum FN_COMBINE_DIVIDE
 23:       PetscEnum FN_COMBINE_COMPOSE

 25:       parameter (FN_COMBINE_ADD           =  0)
 26:       parameter (FN_COMBINE_MULTIPLY      =  1)
 27:       parameter (FN_COMBINE_DIVIDE        =  2)
 28:       parameter (FN_COMBINE_COMPOSE       =  3)

 30: !
 31: !  End of Fortran include file for the FN package in SLEPc
 32: !
